lexUnit.name: disarmament.n

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: FN: the act of causing an individual (organization, nation, etc.) to disarm themselves.
